product_name: Up the Lake with a Paddle: Volume 2 - Tahoe Region, Crystal Basin and Foothill Reservoirs
long_description: An essential resource for enjoying the beautiful lakes, rivers and reservoirs of the Lake Tahoe region. Van der Ven, William. Softcover; 250 pages; 100 black-and-white photos; 29 maps. Fine Edge; copyright 2000. Provides the canoeist and kayaker with easy-to-read maps and highlights of more than 25 paddling areas in the Sierras. Descriptions of local flora, fauna and geology capture the mood of each lake or river.
short_description: An essential resource for enjoying the beautiful lakes, rivers and reservoirs of the Lake Tahoe region.
